item.description:
Join us for a terrific night of multiple 5 minute dates! Roger will be hosting this very first event in the Plymouth area. Got5minutes.com has been hosting these events for 7 years in CT and has just moved into the Boston area. Two important things to keep in mind!

1. You must register for this event at www.got5minutes.com and don't wait too long as these events fill up fast. The website will give you so much more information so take a look today.

2. Got5minutes.com recruits from many other venues including their own meetup called south shore singles looking for a match. Soooo the RSVP list on this site is only a fraction of those attending!

Please join us as you will have a blast! And register today to be sure you get a spot!!
item.how_to_find_us: we are in the private room
item.name: Singles ages 31-49
